content.webTitle: Philip French: Rebellion: The Litvinenko Case

fields.headline: Rebellion: The Litvinenko Case
fields.bodyText: Rebellion: The Litvinenko Case (103 mins, 12A) Directed by Andrei Nekrasov There is a long, passionate interview with Alexander Litvinenko in Andrei Nekrasov's documentary Rebellion: The Litvinenko Case, and a memorable moment of black comedy when the cocky alleged assassin, ex-KGB agent Andrei Lugovoi, offers his interviewer a cup of tea. But despite some fascinating moments, it's a muddled, unilluminating picture.
